testsuite.name: UserControllerSpec

testcase.name: should save the user when save button is clicked
should display error message when the user name is empty and save is clicked
should display error message when the user name saved already exists
should create the pair when two users are paired together
should give error when a user is paired with itself
should give error when a user pair that already exists is created again

testsuite.system-out: --Output from should save the user when save button is clicked-- --Output from should display error message when the user name is empty and save is clicked-- --Output from should display error message when the user name saved already exists -- --Output from should create the pair when two users are paired together-- first user nameSneha first user pairs[Pooja] second user namePooja second user pairs[Sneha] --Output from should give error when a user is paired with itself-- --Output from should give error when a user pair that already exists is created again-- first user nameSneha first user pairs[Pooja] second user namePooja second user pairs[Sneha] first user nameSneha first user pairs[Pooja] second user namePooja second user pairs[Sneha]
testsuite.system-err: --Output from should save the user when save button is clicked-- --Output from should display error message when the user name is empty and save is clicked-- --Output from should display error message when the user name saved already exists -- --Output from should create the pair when two users are paired together-- --Output from should give error when a user is paired with itself-- --Output from should give error when a user pair that already exists is created again--
